title: Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 33 (Nazism, F
description:
Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 33 (Nazism, Fascism 2):

We have 28 titles here:

-  Bergen - Twisted Cross; the German Christian Movement in the Third Reich (1996)

-  Brendon - The Dark Valley; a Panorama of the 1930s (2000)

-  Bullock - Hitler, a Study in Tyranny (revised edition) (1964)

-  Charny - Fascism and Democracy in the Human Mind; a Bridge between Mind and Society (2006)

-  Evans - The Coming of the Third Reich (2003)

-  Evans - The Third Reich in Power (2005)

-  Evans - The Third Reich at War (2008)

-  Fritz - Ostkrieg; Hitler's War of Extermination in the East (2011)

-  Goodrick-Clarke - Hitler's Priestess; Savitri Devi, the Hindu-Aryan Myth, and Neo-Nazism (1998)

-  Goodrick-Clarke - The Occult Roots of Nazism; Secret Aryan Cults and Their Influence on Nazi Ideology (2004)

-  Gregor - Mussolini's Intellectuals; Fascist, Social and Political Thought (2005)

-  Hale - Hitler's Foreign Executioners; Europe's Dirty Secret (2011)

-  Jessen & Richter (Eds.) - Voting for Hitler and Stalin; Elections Under 20th Century Dictatorships (2011)

-  Kallis - Fascist Ideology; Territory and Expansionism in Italy and Germany, 1922Ã¢â‚¬â€œ1945 (2000)
